src:
The nation's cartoonists on the week in politics
01 Nov 2019, 05:21 by POLITICO STAFF
Every week political cartoonists throughout the country and across the political spectrum apply their ink-stained skills to capture the foibles, memes, hypocrisies and other head-slapping events in the world of politics. The fruits of these labors are hundreds of cartoons that entertain and enrage readers of all political stripes. Here's an offering of the best of this week's crop, picked fresh off the Toonosphere. Edited by Matt Wuerker.






Signe Wilkinson - Washington Post Writers Group and Cartoonist Group





John Cole - The Scranton Times-Tribune, PA





Monte Wolverton - Battle Ground, WA





Bill Bramhall - NY Daily News and Tribune





Jim Morin - Morin Toons





Clay Bennett - Washington Post Writers Group - Cartoonist Group





Ward Sutton





Christopher Weyant - The Boston Globe, MA





Matt Bors - Andrews McMeel Syndicate





Michael Ramirez - Creators





Steve Kelley - Creators





Matt Dvies - Newsday and Andrews McMeel Syndicate





M. Wuerker - POLITICO





Michael Ramirez - Creators





Matt Davies - Newsday and Andrews McMeel
